long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Do you have too many tabs open in your browser? Do you want to focus on the ones that matter most? Ticking Tabs is the extension for you!

Ticking Tabs lets you open new tabs that have a timer associated with them. If you don’t revisit them within a certain time (default 30 seconds), they will close automatically. This way, you can avoid cluttering your browser with unnecessary tabs and save memory and bandwidth.

You can easily create and manage your ticking tabs using keyboard shortcuts:
- Alt or Option + 1: Open a new ticking tab
- Alt or Option + 2: Convert a normal tab into a ticking tab
- Alt or Option + 3: Convert a ticking tab into a normal tab
You can also customize the timer duration and other settings in the extension.

Ticking Tabs is a simple and effective way to improve your browsing experience and productivity.

Open-Source Github Repo: https://github.com/chriskim2273/TickingTabs
